Nightlight::

The femme sat down near Trinity "You're a maximal" said the femme 
while touch kindly Trinity "If you behave like a maximal you can go 
to Matrix... Matrix is the place where our sparks come and return..."

Nightlight hugged Trinity "Some day you will get it..."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., logomorph@h... wrote:
> Trinity::
> 
> She jumped down from Nightlight's arms and stood next to her.  She 
> kept her gaze skyward. "So, like those stars, Mommy and Daddy are 
> still there, I just can't see them? But I can't hear them either. 
Or 
> hug them. Or anything else.  What good is it to have them here, if 
> you can't hug them, or look at them, or play with them."  She sat 
on 
> her hind legs and pouted. "I don't get it. Why do bots leave in the 
> first place? Why can't they just stay here forever?"  She swatted 
her 
> paw at a weed sticking up out of the ground,"I don't like the 
Matrix. 
> It's mean. Worse than that spider bot I met once. I don't get it. 
Mom 
> and Dad were Maximals.  So does the Matrix only take Maximals?  And 
> if I'm a predacon, then that means I won't see my mommy and daddy 
> ever again huh?"  She sniffled. "It's just not fair and I don't 
like 
> it. It's mean is what it is."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Nightlight::
> > 
> > 
> > "They are there..." said Nightlight "When day comes you can't see 
> > them, but you know that they are there... the same happen with 
your 
> > mom and your dad... they always will be with you altought you 
can't 
> > see them... I'll alway will be with you altough you can't see 
me... 
> > don't cry more, Trinity, all will be ok... you will see"
> >
